name: The Last Raccoon
description:
This game is about the adventures, which arose when one man decided to rescue the last (probably the last) raccoon. Extinction of other raccoons was of course caused by cities becoming too clean. Animals, being very dirty creatures, had to be gotten rid of. Obviously that wasn't going to happen to out dear raccoon. In the time of need he met his saviour, who decided to KEEP him (IT) ALIVE!

What is this?
It's a tower-defense game, where you have to protect the brave rescuers electric car. You can accomplish that by placing turrets. Beware the turrets will run out of energy over time. That will force you to renew them according to the current situation.

How to play?

It's quite simple. Just drag and drop turrets needed for the current defence. If you have enough funds (you aquire them by killing enemies), the turret will start building. After building process is done, it will start shooting at enemies and using up its energy.

Your car can take first enemy attack, but the second one will destroy it.

Also you can pause by hitting ESCAPE.The difficulty is too high or too low?

You can change the difficulty in Options in the main menu.

How to install?

  1. Unzip the .zip file you downloaded,
  2. Run The Last Raccoon.exe,
  3. Unity launcher should start up, if it doesn't make sure, that you've properly unzipped the file.

Enjoy!
